languages.text: {n}Джай становится серьезной.{/n} "Я хочу чтобы они знали — да, их госпо{mf|дин|жа} избрал{mf||а} меня. Да, контрабандистку и воровку. Да, мы проводим вместе ночи. Пусть не шепчутся больше по углам, а знают это наверняка. Мне нравится быть вашей спутницей и вашей любовницей, но я — не постыдный секрет, меня нельзя взять и спрятать от глаз "приличных людей". Надеюсь, вас это устраивает, шерин".

{n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that their {mf|master|mistress} has chosen me, a smuggler and a thief. And I want them to know that we spend our nights together. They won't need to whisper behind our backs once they know the truth. I enjoy being your companion and your lover, but I am not some embarrassing secret to be hidden away from so-called 'decent' people. I hope you take no issue with it, shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай становится серьезной.{/n} "Я хочу чтобы они знали — да, их госпо{mf|дин|жа} избрал{mf||а} меня. Да, контрабандистку и воровку. Да, мы проводим вместе ночи. Пусть не шепчутся больше по углам, а знают это наверняка. Мне нравится быть вашей спутницей и вашей любовницей, но я — не постыдный секрет, меня нельзя взять и спрятать от глаз "приличных людей". Надеюсь, вас это устраивает, шерин".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that yes, their {mf|master|mistress} did choose me, a smuggler and a thief. Yes, we are spending our nights together. They need not whisper in corners anymore now that they know the truth. I enjoy being your companion and your mistress, but I am not a shameful secret, I cannot be taken and hidden from the eyes of the 'decent people'. I hope this agrees with you, shereen."

{n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that yes, their {mf|master|mistress} did choose me, a smuggler and a thief. Yes, we are spending our nights together. I enjoy being your companion and your lover, but I am not some embarrassing secret to be hidden away from so-called 'decent' people. I hope you take no issue with it, shereen."

languages.text: {n}Jae reprend son sérieux.{/n} « Je veux qu'ils sachent que leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} m'a choisie moi, une contrebandière doublée d'une voleuse. Je veux qu'ils sachent que nous passons nos nuits ensemble et que, maintenant qu'ils connaissent la vérité, ils n'auront plus besoin de parler dans notre dos. J'apprécie d'être votre compagne et amante, mais je refuse d'être un secret gênant que l'on cache aux gens soi-disant "honnêtes". J'espère que cela ne vous pose pas de problème, shereen. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that their {mf|master|mistress} has chosen me, a smuggler and a thief. And I want them to know that we spend our nights together. They won't need to whisper behind our backs once they know the truth. I enjoy being your companion and your lover, but I am not some embarrassing secret to be hidden away from so-called 'decent' people. I hope you take no issue with it, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae reprend son sérieux.{/n} « Je veux qu'ils sachent que leur {mf|maître|maîtresse} m'a choisie moi, une contrebandière doublée d'une voleuse. Je veux qu'ils sachent que nous passons nos nuits ensemble et que, maintenant qu'ils connaissent la vérité, ils n'auront plus besoin de parler dans notre dos. J'apprécie d'être votre compagne et amante, mais je refuse d'être un secret gênant que l'on cache aux gens soi-disant "honnêtes". J'espère que cela ne vous pose pas de problème, shereen. »

languages.text: {n}婕伊变得严肃起来。{/n}“我想让所有人都知道，他们的{mf|主人|女主人}确实选择了我这个小偷、走私犯。我希望他们知道，我们每晚都呆在一起。当他们得知真相之后，就不需要在我们背后继续窃窃私语了。我真的很喜欢做你的伴侣，你的爱人，但我也想确信，这件事情并不是什么不可告人的尴尬秘密，不需要瞒着什么所谓的‘正派’人。我希望你对此不会有意见，亲爱的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that their {mf|master|mistress} has chosen me, a smuggler and a thief. And I want them to know that we spend our nights together. They won't need to whisper behind our backs once they know the truth. I enjoy being your companion and your lover, but I am not some embarrassing secret to be hidden away from so-called 'decent' people. I hope you take no issue with it, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊变得严肃起来。{/n}“我想让所有人都知道，他们的{mf|主人|女主人}确实选择了我这个小偷、走私犯。我希望他们知道，而我们每晚都呆在一起。当他们得知真相之后，就不需要在我们背后继续窃窃私语了。我真的很喜欢做你的伴侣，你的爱人，但我也想确信，这件事情并不是什么不可告人的尴尬秘密，不需要瞒着什么所谓的‘正派’人。我希望你对此不会有意见，亲爱的。”

languages.text: {n}Jae wird ernst.{/n} "Sie sollen wissen, dass {mf|ihr Meister|ihre Meistern} mich gewählt hat, eine Schmugglerin und Diebin. Und sie sollen wissen, dass wir unsere Nächte gemeinsam verbringen. Sie müssen nicht hinter unseren Rücken flüstern, wenn sie die Wahrheit kennen. Ich genieße es, Eure Gefährtin und Geliebte zu sein, doch ich bin kein peinliches Geheimnis, das vor den so genannten 'anständigen' Leuten versteckt werden muss. Ich hoffe, Ihr nehmt keinen Anstoß daran, Shereen."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that their {mf|master|mistress} has chosen me, a smuggler and a thief. And I want them to know that we spend our nights together. They won't need to whisper behind our backs once they know the truth. I enjoy being your companion and your lover, but I am not some embarrassing secret to be hidden away from so-called 'decent' people. I hope you take no issue with it, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae wird ernst.{/n} "Sie sollen wissen, dass {mf|ihr Meister|ihre Meistern} mich gewählt hat, eine Schmugglerin und Diebin. Und sie sollen wissen, dass wir unsere Nächte gemeinsam verbringen. Sie müssen nicht hinter unseren Rücken flüstern, wenn sie die Wahrheit kennen. Ich genieße es, Eure Gefährtin und Geliebte zu sein, doch ich bin kein peinliches Geheimnis, das vor den so genannten 'anständigen' Leuten versteckt werden muss. Ich hoffe, Ihr nehmt keinen Anstoß daran, Shereen."

languages.text: {n}Jae se pone seria.{/n} «Quiero que sepan que su {mf|señor|señora} me ha escogido a mí, una contrabandista y una ladrona. Y quiero que sepan que pasamos las noches junt{mf|o|a}s. Cuando sepan la verdad, no tendrán que susurrar a nuestras espaldas. Me gusta ser tu compañera y tu amante, pero no quiero ser un secreto que debes esconder de la gente supuestamente "decente". Espero que esto no te moleste, shereen».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that their {mf|master|mistress} has chosen me, a smuggler and a thief. And I want them to know that we spend our nights together. They won't need to whisper behind our backs once they know the truth. I enjoy being your companion and your lover, but I am not some embarrassing secret to be hidden away from so-called 'decent' people. I hope you take no issue with it, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se pone seria.{/n} «Quiero que sepan que su {mf|señor|señora} me ha escogido a mí, una contrabandista y una ladrona. Y quiero que sepan que pasamos las noches junt{mf|o|a}s. Cuando sepan la verdad, no tendrán que susurrar a nuestras espaldas. Me gusta ser tu compañera y tu amante, pero no quiero ser un secreto que debes esconder de la gente supuestamente "decente". Espero que esto no te moleste, shereen».

languages.text: {n}ジェイは真剣になる。{/n}「彼らには、自分の主人が密輸業者で泥棒でもあるこのあたしを選んだこと、そしてあたしたちが夜を共に過ごすことを知っていてほしいの。彼らが真実を知っていれば、陰であたしたちのことを噂する必要はなくなる。あたしはシャリーンの仲間兼恋人であることを楽しんでいるけれど、いわゆる『立派な』人々から隠されるべき恥ずかしい秘密ではないの。このことについては、理解してくれると良いのだけど、シャリーン」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that their {mf|master|mistress} has chosen me, a smuggler and a thief. And I want them to know that we spend our nights together. They won't need to whisper behind our backs once they know the truth. I enjoy being your companion and your lover, but I am not some embarrassing secret to be hidden away from so-called 'decent' people. I hope you take no issue with it, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは真剣になる。{/n}「彼らには、自分の主人が密輸業者で泥棒でもあるこのあたしを選んだこと、そしてあたしたちが夜を共に過ごすことを知っていてほしいの。彼らが真実を知っていれば、陰であたしたちのことを噂する必要はなくなる。あたしはシャリーンの仲間兼恋人であることを楽しんでいるけれど、いわゆる『立派な』人々から隠されるべき恥ずかしい秘密ではないの。このことについては、理解してくれると良いのだけど、シャリーン」

languages.text: {n}Jae ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Efendilerinin beni, bir kaçakçı ve bir hırsız olan beni seçtiğini bilmelerini istiyorum. Gecelerimizi birlikte geçirdiğimizi de bilmelerini istiyorum. Gerçeği öğrenince arkamızdan dedikodu yapmalarına gerek kalmaz. Senin eşlikçin ve sevgilin olmak hoşuma gidiyor ama ben, o sözde 'düzgün' insanlardan gizlenmesi gereken utanç verici bir sır değilim. Umarım senin de bununla bir sorunun yoktur şirinim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae becomes serious.{/n} "I want them to know that their {mf|master|mistress} has chosen me, a smuggler and a thief. And I want them to know that we spend our nights together. They won't need to whisper behind our backs once they know the truth. I enjoy being your companion and your lover, but I am not some embarrassing secret to be hidden away from so-called 'decent' people. I hope you take no issue with it, shereen."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae ciddileşiyor.{/n} "Efendilerinin beni, bir kaçakçı ve bir hırsız olan beni seçtiğini bilmelerini istiyorum. Ayrıca bilmelerini istiyorum ki gecelerimizi birlikte geçiriyoruz. Gerçeği öğrendilerse arkamızdan dedikodu yapmalarına gerek kalmaz. Senin eşlikçin ve sevgilin olmak hoşuma gidiyor ama ben o sözde 'düzgün' insanlardan gizlenmesi gereken utanç verici bir sır değilim. Umarım senin de bununla bir sorunun yoktur şirinim."
